msIdentifier.collection: Adjutant General Letter Book - No. 3 ; 9 April - 25 May 1864

body.p: To the Governor stating that he has a son at Bridgeport, Ala. under arrest for desertion. The circumstances are, that he was at home as a paroled prisoner, and was induced to recruit for the 40th Ky. under promise that if he got a commission he did that he would be transferred. He was turned over by Col True as a deserter. Wants you to assist him if you can

Hd qrs Ky Volunteers
Adjutant Genls Office
Frankfort Ky
April 20th 1864
Respectfully referred to Col. E S Watts of the 2d Ky Cavl James McGuire is reported as a deserter on rolls of Company "C" of your regiment. Your attention is called to the within statement.
